name: Ai Simdate
description:
Ai Simdate is a male pov dating simulation game, created with the visual novel engine Renpy! What's so special about it? It's used and created using Ai artwork and Ai story-writing during certain parts of the story! Have a blast from the past with a modern day sim-date <3

  • You have a 30 days to get your life together! Study, work-out, hang out with friends and advance through life!
  • Has numerous mini-games, activities, events/quests and rich with artwork~!
  • 3 date-able characters, each one having a spicy twist~
  • 8 DIFFERENT ENDINGS!
  • Upcoming DLC with an additional character, extra scenes, minigames and NSFW content ;)
  • The game is recommended for ages 16+, and not suitable for workplace.
  • Join our community! My discord server is full of interesting topics and extras, stay tuned for the DLC & updates, or report any bugs or issues!
  • For any donations you can buy me some pizza :3  Thanks in advance!
